timeline.message: First attempt in adding fetchSize alongside size

Integrate size/fetch size as LimitWithOffset within the planExecutor

Combine the request size and pipe declaration with the query into one
For eventQuery push the limit into the query, for sequences keep the
limit on the sequence but push the fetch size in the queries.
Add fetch size parameter in the rest client API
skip stages only when there are no candidates on the current stage
Don't set beginning of follow-up query to avoid them jumping over data
Update query next only when at least one result has been returned
Reinitialize pointer when doing desc/asc queries
Increase the default size of results in testing

timeline.bodyText: I would rename the arg to fetchSize
timeline.author: matriv

replies.bodyText: Will rename it in a follow-up PR. I'd like to merge this in considering it took 3 times due to transient issues and backport it to 7.x
replies.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to make it a random between let's say 1 and 10?
timeline.author: matriv

replies.bodyText:
It does - it has to be 2 since we're talking about a window (1 would work but the algo would have to change - that requires an extra call that I'd rather avoid).
I've pushed it with 2 just to get the build running enough times with this minimum size - I'll follow-up in the until PR with random.
replies.author: costin

timeline.author: costin

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the heads up. #59085 should already cover the changes to size. I'll work on documenting the fetch_size param.
replies.author: jrodewig
